title: Social Learning Design Project Through Collaborative Decision-Making

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of social phenomena and proficiency in digital device usage
context.additional_context: A project where teachers and learners collaboratively design learning activities, exploring social issues through smartphone-based microlearning.

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with teachers to design social issue-solving learning activities
Learners can use digital tools to document and share collaborative decision-making processes
Learners can propose learning scenarios incorporating principles of social equity

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
